MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am due to safety concerns on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00am on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
